description: A simple object to allow referencing of objects contained within the Components Object

reference.description: A runtime expression used to reference the desired object

anyOf.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().
MUST be a valid JSON array serialized as a string, e.g. "[1, 2, 3]". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

value.description: Sets a value of the referenced parameter
